si.title: කුඩු අඩු කිරීම සඳහා ඇප
body_lines: සංවිධානාත්මක අපරාධ සමඟ සම්බන්ධ වී සිටින ජැනිට් මධුසංග ​​ඇප මත මුදා හැර තිබේ.

en.title: Bail for Powder Lessi
body_lines: Janit Madusanga, who is associated with organized crimes, has been released on bail.

summary_lines: "Janit Madusanga, linked to organized crime, granted bail. Case highlights ongoing concerns about criminal justice system leniency towards high-profile offenders."
